serverHost.title: Server host
serverHost.description: The host to run Delve on, usually localhost

serverPort.title: Server port
serverPort.description: The port to run Delve on

logServerMessages.title: Log server messages
logServerMessages.description: Writes all delve messages to the console if on

buildFlags.title: Delve build flags
buildFlags.description: Custom build flags to pass to delve when starting a session

usePendingOnJump.title: Use pending tabs on jump
usePendingOnJump.description: If on uses pending tabs when the debugger state moves to an unopened file
